CPU Mode
CSL ARCH Module » C66x

Files

file  dsp_usrSpvSupport.h
 This file contains the API prototypes for configuring mode of DSP (User/Supervisor)
 

Macros

#define DSP_CPU_MODE_SPV   (0x0U)
 CPU mode: SUPERVISOR.
 
#define DSP_CPU_MODE_USR   (0x1U)
 CPU mode: USER.
 

Functions

void DSP_setCpuMode (uint32_t mode)
 Set the DSP CPU mode to requested value. This will set up the SWENR handler internally on first execution. More...
 
uint32_t DSP_getCpuMode (void)
 Get the current mode of CPU. More...
 

Detailed Description

Function Documentation

uint32_t DSP_getCpuMode ( void  )

Get the current mode of CPU.

Returns
0 => Supervisor mode, 1 => User mode
void DSP_setCpuMode ( uint32_t  mode)

Set the DSP CPU mode to requested value. This will set up the SWENR handler internally on first execution.

Parameters
modeRequested mode. 0 => Supervisor mode, 1 => User mode
Returns
none
